articles.title: 'The Rock' for president? Celebrities ponder 2024 presidential runs.
articles.description: As Joe Biden's approval ratings plummet and voters sour on Trump, celebrities are mulling potential independent or third-party presidential bids.

articles.title: Alex Jones could pay much less than the $49 million sought by jury
articles.description: The jury ordered Alex Jones to pay $45.2 million as punishment for his Sandy Hook lies, but Texas law caps punitive damages at $750,000.
